useCase: Identifying GAN-generated images and attributing content to specific AI model architectures
mechanism: Extracts spectral features from the frequency domain that are unique to specific GAN architectures (StyleGAN, ProGAN, BigGAN, etc.). Uses pre-trained classifiers to match fingerprint patterns against known GAN model signatures.
accuracy: Very High - 92-98% for known GAN architectures, lower for novel models
name: GAN Fingerprint Detection
source: Marra et al. (2019) - Do GANs Leave Artificial Fingerprints?; Yu et al. (2019)
parameters: FFT size: 256x256, Feature extraction: azimuthal average, Classifier: multi-class SVM, Known models: 15+ GAN architectures
description: Identifies unique fingerprints left by Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs). Each GAN architecture produces characteristic spectral patterns in generated images.
